mkr.ant.taskdefs
Class PathConvert

java.lang.Object
  org.copalis.mkr.ant.AntRef<T>
      org.copalis.mkr.ant.AntTask<org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.PathConvert>
          mkr.ant.taskdefs.PathConvert

public class PathConvert
extends AntTask<org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.PathConvert>

Converts path and classpath information to a specific target OS format. The resulting formatted path is placed into the specified property.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.PathConvert)

setRuntimeConfigurableWrapper

public PathConvert setRuntimeConfigurableWrapper(org.apache.tools.ant.RuntimeConfigurable val)
Sets the wrapper to be used for runtime configuration. This method should be used only by the ProjectHelper and Ant internals. It is public to allow helper plugins to operate on tasks, normal tasks should never use it.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.Task.setRuntimeConfigurableWrapper)
